content: this text is a legal document that explains the progress of a divorce settlement between two parties mr a and mrs e the procedure has been ongoing for almost 8 years and involves the division of assets and debts it provides details of the revenue received and expenses paid such as housing allowance legal costs mortgage payments insurance premiums and tax payments the document proposes a division of the remaining assets and is overseen by a notaryliquidator it concludes with information about the continuation of the procedure and the possibility of objections or disputes additionally the text mentions the completion of an official report and the payment of a fee
